item.title: CVE-2022-27492|2024-08-03T05:32:57.902Z -- meta -- whatsapp%20business%20for%20ios
item.description: An integer underflow in WhatsApp could have caused remote code execution when receiving a crafted video file.

item.title: CVE-2022-36934|2024-08-03T10:21:32.100Z -- meta -- whatsapp%20for%20ios
item.description: An integer overflow in WhatsApp could result in remote code execution in an established video call.
